allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d mathematics_curriculum -c "\dt curriculum.*")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d mathematics_curriculum -c "
SELECT 
    schemaname,
    tablename,
    n_tup_ins as total_rows
FROM pg_stat_user_tables 
WHERE schemaname = ''curriculum''
ORDER BY tablename;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d mathematics_curriculum -c "
SELECT 
    schemaname,
    relname as tablename,
    n_tup_ins as total_rows
FROM pg_stat_user_tables 
WHERE schemaname = ''curriculum''
ORDER BY relname;
")
